FuncDef:
The rip mib-binding command associates Management Information Base (MIB) and a RIP process.
The undo rip mib-binding command dissociates MIB from a RIP process.
By default, no RIP process is associated with MIB.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a RIP process ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The rip mib-binding command associates Management Information Base (MIB) and a RIP process.
Precautions
All Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP) requests are sent to the bound RIP process.
